Code snippets in a blog post

Krishna Murthy Jatavallabhula, Ganesh Iyer, Liam Paull · August 12, 2019

HTML   Code

This post demonstrate the use of code snippets in the theme. The code snippets are powered by Pygments and the code theme that is been used in Reverie is called Draula.

This is a raw snippet:

hello world
123
This is a text snippet

This is a PHP snippet:

<?php
    echo 'Hello, World!';
?>

This is a JavaScript snippet:

const add = (a, b) => a + b
const minus = (a, b) => a - b

console.log(add(100,200))  // 300
console.log(minus(100,200))  // -100

This is a Python snippet:

def say_hello():
    print("hello world!")

say_hello()   // "hello world!"

Share: Twitter, Facebook
